meanings.definition: The introduction of new words or expressions into a language.
meanings.sent1: Neologies can enrich a language by adding fresh terms.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys exploring neologies to understand modern communication better.
meanings.sent3: The neologies in the text made her giggle at the creative language.
meanings.sent4: His neologies were like colorful paint splashes on the canvas of speech.
meanings.sent5: The teacher made learning neologies fun and exciting for the students.

meanings.definition: The study or use of new words or expressions.
meanings.sent1: Studying neologies helps linguists track language evolution.
meanings.sent2: Her passion for neologies led her to become a language researcher.
meanings.sent3: The book on neologies was both informative and entertaining.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, neologies were like puzzle pieces forming a new language picture.
meanings.sent5: The workshop on neologies sparked her curiosity and love for words.
